question: Which state / UT has highest Internet penetration in India as of November, 2019?
explanation: About 67 per cent of India\'s 451 million monthly active Internet users are male, according to a report brought out by industry body Internet and Mobile Association of India (IAMAI). At the state level, the National Capital Region of Delhi registered the highest Internet penetration (reaching 100%) followed by Kerala(54%), Haryana, Himachal Pradesh and Punjab.
